poem:
### In Absentia

The eyes of duty closed;  
misplaced footsteps marked  
a map of neglect. Bruises  
bloomed like dark prayers  
answered in silence.  

A fragile flame snuffed out,  
unseen by those blinded  
by routine; her whispers  
lost in the echo of doors  
knocking where she was not.
